item.description:
Hi All...

Dali is another great Tapas Bar/experience. The ambiance is worth the trip alone!

Time: 7:00PM

At:

Dali Restaurant & Tapas Bar
www.dalirestaurant.com

415 Washington St
Somerville, MA 02143
(617) 661-3254

Few places are as trendy as Dali, with its copper ceilings, vibrant colors and candle lighting. Some people refer to the restaurant as a beautiful visual/theatrical experience.

Waiters ferry sherry, sangria and Spanish wines from the eclectic bar, where a diverse crowd passes the time. The kitchen churns out dependable interpretations of regional Spanish tapas such as garlic shrimp, chilled vinegary octopus, sauteed mushrooms and baked goat cheese from the menu of 40-plus tapas.

Hope to see you at Dali.

group.name: Brunch & More (20/30-Somethings for brunch & more, etc...)

item.name: Tapas at Dali - Somerville
